CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 11, 1953, pg. 16 reads: "There Were Flocks Of Kids At The YMCA Egg Hunt - The annual Easter Egg Hunt sponsored by the Y's Men's Club of the Centre Avenue YMCA this year was a great success as it always is. The youngsters roamed the YMCA building and grounds in search for the hidden eggs and the prizes which were awarded for the children finding the most eggs.  The event took up an entire afternoon. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of boys and girls holding Easter eggs, gathered in the Centre Avenue YMCA for annual Easter Egg Hunt
